name: Stay Out Of The Farm
description:
Free Prologue:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2166490/Stay_Out_Of_The_Farm_Prologue/


Stay Out Of The Farm is a stealth-driven slasher with old school PS1 style graphics. You are an ordinary supermarket worker who works night shifts and performs routine tasks. However, everything changes when you try to earn some extra money and become a courier outside the city. While delivering a package, you end up on a strange farm where you encounter a maniac and try to escape from this place. During your way to escape you need to stay quite and stay out of sight, owner of the farm is not about to let his newest guest leave so soon.



Key Features:

∎ Psychological horror: The game will drive you insane.

∎ 2 endings: There are good and bad.

∎ Retro graphics: Low poly visuals authentic to the PS1 era

∎ Immersive experience: An atmospheric horror experience
